title: Mario: The Philippines
creator_contributor_role: South Australian Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Family - Asia, Southeastern

description: Study of Mario, a Filipino boy aged about eight years how has left school and works to help with the family income. Notes the life style of the people, the market, the role of the children and a causeway built for the locals by Australian engineers.
